column4: anyone familiar with checkinstall ? I have done 'sudo checkinstall' and 'sudo checkinstall make cd-sounds-install' and 'sudo checkinstall make cd-moh-install'. Does this create a single package with both options or am I creating a new package reconfigured only with latest option ?
just do a checkinstall in the folder with the make / configure file
the rest is automatic
I have run the above as individual runs
provided you have the compile prerequisites of cause, but the configure step should sort that out
checkinstall will make a deb pkg for you
install that by double clicking it when the compile is done
